long_description:
The holidays can be a great time to get away. With a spirit of kindness and gratitude in the air, it’s one of the best times to see a new city and connect with family and friends in a different locale. On friendly but still-unfamiliar ground, outside your normal, everyday context, the experience can give you a new appreciation for the unique people and blessings in your life. So much so that the trip itself can become just that, a blessing. 

All that to say — now’s the time to plan it. Or at least think about it. Of course, we at SCH would consider it an honor to host your holiday getaway, and to encourage just that, here’s our special offer.

Book your holiday stay at Stanford Court now and enjoy 25% off your room rate. 

You have a little more time to get the logistics planned and think it over, and if you need help just give us a call. The offer is good for stays between November 2017 and January 7, 2018.

So, no matter if you’re joining us for Thanksgiving, Hanukkah, Christmas, or New Year’s Eve, we’re happy to extend this special discount. 

We hope to see you soon!
